automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_follow_on'
alias: Office WLED - Stage Living Room Then Full Bright
description: "When Office WLED turns on, bring Living Room to 70% then Office WLED to 100%."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - delay: '00:00:02'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 70
  - delay: '00:00:03'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 100
